search_results.title: Lou Berney Bio
search_results.snippet: Lou Berney is USA Today best-selling author of seven novels, including Crooks, Dark Ride, November Road, and The Long and Faraway Gone.

search_results.title: About Lou — Lou Radja — Speaker. Author. Coach.
search_results.snippet: Lou has engaged global citizens from all over the world on topics such as: Leadership, Humanitarianism, Following Your Dream, Diversity, Personal Accountability ...

search_results.title: Remembering Professor Armstrong (Lou) Starkey, PhD
search_results.snippet: Lou Starkey, PhD, was a beloved professor, friend and colleague who brought history to life for students, colleagues and readers of his well-received books.
